direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods validate tags and attributes but focus on different aspects (tags vs. attributes).

Both methods involve managing and validating attributes, with removeAttributes modifying the allowed attributes.

Both methods involve managing and validating attributes, with removeEnforcedAttribute modifying the enforced attributes.
